text: Helena Krajčiová (born 19 April 1975) is a Slovak actress and singer. At the 2010 Sun in a Net Awards she won the category of Best Supporting Actress, for her performance in the film Soul at Peace. Krajčiová was named Best Actress at the 14th OTO Awards. == Selected filmography == *Panelák (television, 2008–2011) *Soul at Peace (2009) *Búrlivé víno (television, 2013–2017) *The Red Captain (2016) *Sestričky (television, 2018–2019) *Nový život (television, 2020–present) == References == ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak female singers Category:Slovak film actresses Category:Slovak stage actresses Category:Slovak television actresses Category:People from Skalica Category:21st-century Slovak actresses Category:Sun in a Net Awards winners Category:21st-century women singers
title: Helena Krajčiová
